main.name: Ramandeep Sihra
main.description1: Financial Systems Assistant - Microsoft Certified Professional
main.description2: Helping companies with their data needs
bio: A prospective Data Analyst with 5 years experience in handling data with prestigious companies, such as DB Schenker and Microsoft. I am currently looking for positions where I can
apply my skills to support companies achieve their targets by tackling technological challenges. In my spare time I like to travel and explore new places.

resume.skillmessage: Here are my software and languages skills.

certifications.degree: Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate (MCSA) - SQL Development
Microsoft Technology Associate (MTA) - Introduction to programming using Python

work.title: Financial Systems Assistant
description: Assisting, creating and updating processes for the launch of MDM application.
Developed a KPI dashboard to identify coding errors and covered gaps in training, which improved accuracy by 10%.
Running 5 UK and 3 Ireland daily reports in internal systems for the Shared Service Centre.
Supporting 50 global Master Data Management (MDM) teams as a UK MDM Steward support contact.
Conducting accurate validation checks for the creation of financial accounts in SAP and preparation for audit analysis.

work.title: Finance Administrator
description: Processed and validated UKâ€™s supplier mail reaching daily target of 400 invoices.
Managed supplier disputes and queried 250 invoices on behalf of the branches and fixed daily errors for 150 invoices.

work.title: Partner Incentives Support Analyst
description: Analysed, validated, and interpreted 50 incentive requests and provided validation status reports to internal and external stakeholders.
Performed audit checks on incentive requests and ran 2 MS Excel macro-based reports for data validation.
Trained internal staff on SharePoint and Dynamic CRM database.

skills.software: SSMS, SAP-ERP, MS SharePoint, MS Dynamics, MS Excel, MS Access

skills.data_concepts: Extraction, Validation, Cleansing, Analysis, Manipulation, Visualization, Reporting

projects.title: Master Data Management (MDM) Application
projects.category: Assisted with the launch and trained team members on how to use the new MDM application.

projects.title: Finance Team KPI
projects.category: Created a report and dashbooard for the finance team at DB Schenker to identify gaps in training.

projects.title: PC Land SQL Database
projects.category: Created a fully functional T-SQL database and queries on it for a scenario based on a fictional PC shop.

projects.title: Star Media Channel Enagement Report
projects.category: Created a dashboard based on a fictional media company to produce report using Python, T-SQL and MS Excel.

projects.title: Payday Loans Finance Dissertation
projects.category: Conducted research and data analysis on the awareness and implication of payday loans.
